trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: This section contains articles on how to integrate Bluetooth into Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps, including how to use RFCOMM, GATT, and Low Energy (LE) Advertisements.
trans-unit.target: This section contains articles on how to integrate Bluetooth into Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps, including how to use RFCOMM, GATT, and Low Energy (LE) Advertisements.

trans-unit.source: This article provides an overview of the Bluetooth RFCOMM APIs in the [**Windows.Devices.Bluetooth.Rfcomm**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263529) namespace, along with example code on how to send or receive a file.
trans-unit.target: This article provides an overview of the Bluetooth RFCOMM APIs in the [**Windows.Devices.Bluetooth.Rfcomm**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263529) namespace, along with example code on how to send or receive a file.

trans-unit.source: This article provides an overview of the Bluetooth Generic Attribute Profile (GATT) APIs in the [**Windows.Devices.Bluetooth.GenericAttributeProfile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297685) namespace, along with sample code for three common GATT scenarios: retrieving Bluetooth data, controlling a Bluetooth LE thermometer device, and controlling the presentation of Bluetooth LE device data.
trans-unit.target: This article provides an overview of the Bluetooth Generic Attribute Profile (GATT) APIs in the [**Windows.Devices.Bluetooth.GenericAttributeProfile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297685) namespace, along with sample code for three common GATT scenarios: retrieving Bluetooth data, controlling a Bluetooth LE thermometer device, and controlling the presentation of Bluetooth LE device data.

trans-unit.source: This code sample demonstrates how to send and receive Bluetooth Low Energy advertisements using the APIs in the [**Windows.Devices.Bluetooth.Advertisement**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn894325) namespace.
trans-unit.target: This code sample demonstrates how to send and receive Bluetooth Low Energy advertisements using the APIs in the [**Windows.Devices.Bluetooth.Advertisement**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn894325) namespace.
